1.title: Israel's Oppression
1.keyEvent: Israelites increase and are oppressed in Egypt

2.title: Birth of Moses
2.keyEvent: Moses is born and saved from Pharaoh's decree

3.title: Burning Bush
3.keyEvent: God calls Moses through the burning bush

4.title: Signs for Moses
4.keyEvent: God gives Moses signs to prove his calling

5.title: Pharaoh's Refusal
5.keyEvent: Pharaoh rejects Moses and increases Israel's labor

6.title: God's Promise
6.keyEvent: God promises deliverance and renews covenant

7.title: Aaron's Staff Becomes Serpent
7.keyEvent: God empowers Moses and Aaron to confront Pharaoh

8.title: Plagues of Frogs, Gnats, Flies
8.keyEvent: God sends first three plagues on Egypt

9.title: Plagues of Livestock, Boils, Hail
9.keyEvent: God sends three more plagues on Egypt

10.title: Plagues of Locusts and Darkness
10.keyEvent: God sends locusts and darkness over Egypt

11.title: Warning of Death
11.keyEvent: God warns Pharaoh of the final plague

12.title: Passover Instituted
12.keyEvent: God commands the first Passover and death of firstborn

13.title: Consecration of Firstborn
13.keyEvent: God commands dedication of firstborn to Him

14.title: Crossing the Red Sea
14.keyEvent: Israelites cross Red Sea; Egyptians drowned

15.title: Song of Deliverance
15.keyEvent: Moses and Israel praise God for deliverance

16.title: Manna Provided
16.keyEvent: God provides manna and quail in the wilderness

17.title: Water and Victory
17.keyEvent: Water from rock; Israel defeats Amalekites

18.title: Jethro's Advice
18.keyEvent: Jethro advises Moses to delegate leadership

19.title: God at Sinai
19.keyEvent: God prepares Israel to receive the law

20.title: Ten Commandments
20.keyEvent: God gives the Ten Commandments to Israel

21.title: Laws on Servants
21.keyEvent: Laws concerning servants and personal injuries

22.title: Laws on Property
22.keyEvent: Laws about property, restitution, and social justice

23.title: Justice and Sabbath
23.keyEvent: Laws on justice, Sabbath, and festivals

24.title: Covenant Confirmed
24.keyEvent: Israel confirms covenant; Moses on mountain

25.title: Ark and Tabernacle
25.keyEvent: Instructions for Ark, table, and lampstand

26.title: Tabernacle Curtains
26.keyEvent: Instructions for tabernacle curtains and structure

27.title: Altar and Courtyard
27.keyEvent: Instructions for altar and courtyard of tabernacle

28.title: Priestly Garments
28.keyEvent: God commands garments for Aaron and sons

29.title: Consecration of Priests
29.keyEvent: Instructions for consecrating Aaron and sons

30.title: Altar and Incense
30.keyEvent: Instructions for altar of incense and atonement

32.title: Golden Calf
32.keyEvent: Israel sins with golden calf; Moses intercedes

33.title: God's Presence
33.keyEvent: God promises His presence with Israel

34.title: New Stone Tablets
34.keyEvent: God renews covenant; new tablets given

35.title: Sabbath and Offerings
35.keyEvent: Sabbath observed; offerings collected for tabernacle

37.title: Ark and Furnishings
37.keyEvent: Ark, table, lampstand, and altar made

38.title: Courtyard and Altar
38.keyEvent: Courtyard and altar of burnt offering constructed

40.title: Tabernacle Erected
40.keyEvent: Tabernacle set up; God's glory fills it
